name: e-commerce
description: Hello! This is my e-commerce page! I was inspired from the video made by GreatStacks and got some of my assets and elements are from him!  The site runs on react and express. For my database, I used MongoDB and utilize CORS for some base level security. I also made use of middleware called Multer. Multer helps organize my images easier when files are being uploaded to my Mongo database.  Speaking of images, I also integrated images from various people from unsplash whose profiles I will include in the bottom.

scripts.build:admin: cd admin && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:admin & npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: cd backend && npm install & node index.js
